text: Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 37. Not being ill, I will not eat rice or bean curry that I have requested for my own sake: a training to be observed.
